structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.catch_line: Purpose of commission -- Duties and functions.

text.section: The Kentucky African-American Heritage Commission shall be dedicated to the preservation and protection of all meaningful vestiges of Kentucky's African-American heritage.

law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 48, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 112, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 4, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 241, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1996.
